data.text: It was a great hotel. The staff was very polite and helping. It is a beautiful place with beautiful rooms. They are also having a restaurant inside and Bar as well. The attendants were also very polite.
data.title: Great place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest 

Greetings from Fortune Grand Hotel!

Thank you for your overwhelming review and recommendations for taking the time to write a kind review of your stay at the Fortune Grand Hotel.
Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback on Trip Advisor. We would like to express our gratitude to your positive review following your recent event with us. I am delighted to know that the level of our services and facilities exceeded your expectations with the memorable service provided by our team.
Your compliments will be shared with our team; as such flattering remarks continuously inspire us to do our utmost in everything that we do.
We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Fortune Grand Hotel again

Yours sincerely,
Sarah Sydney 
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: fom Fortune Hotels

data.text: Great hotel with great stay,best staffs, hotel have all facilities swimming pool ,gym ,sauna, but we were outside enjoying all our trips.great food at restaurants,paafhetam,maxima,roof top.nuce place
data.title: Best stay

data.text: The staff is really amazing as usual because its been more than 1 year i am staying here. Hotel have all facilities at one place, all restaurants paafheyam, great place to dine ,with sea food,all cuisines,  great promotions, vwaitress all are really awesome,  esp shwetha and team, will strongly recommend, hope to come back
data.title: Amazing Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Abdoulaye,
Greetings from Fortune Grand Hotel!
Thank you for sharing your recent stay experience at Fortune Grand Hotel. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed staying with us. I’m elated to hear that our team was able to make it more memorable, especially by our entire team. Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback on Trip Advisor. We would like to express our gratitude to your positive review following your recent event with us. I am delighted to know that the level of our services and facilities exceeded your expectations with the memorable service provided by our team.
Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and have the pleasure of welcoming you to the Fortune Grand Hotel.
Yours sincerely,
Anand Prakash.R
Front Office Manager
